channel.title: Compliance and auditing on Learn with AI
channel.description: Recent content in Compliance and auditing on Learn with AI

item.title: Legal requirements
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about Legal requirements ChatGPT answer: What are the legal requirements for starting a business in your country or state? What are the legal requirements for hiring employees or independent contractors in your industry? What are the legal requirements for filing taxes and reporting income for your business? What are the legal requirements for protecting customer data and privacy in your industry? What are the legal requirements for obtaining licenses and permits to operate your business in your area?

item.title: Industry standards
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about Industry standards ChatGPT answer: What are some common industry standards for quality management systems? What are the benefits of adhering to industry standards for product safety? How and why are industry standards established and updated over time? What is the role of industry standards in promoting fair competition and market access? What are some examples of industry standards for environmental sustainability and social responsibility?
